name: Be Hive
description:
This is a slow paced relaxing game about farming honey. We have a procedurally generated voxel terrain, populated by bright flowers which the bees will use to make honey. This show nature working together in production.

Created for the Stay safe game jam along the theme of solidarity

Credits

Art - https://twitter.com/Justhenrydan, https://twitter.com/0geova0

Coding - Sherbert, https://github.com/youngman114

Sound -https://soundcloud.com/frankpleececomposer/sets/frank-pleece-demo-reel-1
